SEARCH
Package raytracer.math

Class Color

java.lang.Object
raytracer.math.AbstractVec3
raytracer.math.Color
public final class Color extends AbstractVec3
RGB color stored as doubles in [0,1]. Immutable and clamped on construction. Provides add, scale, Schur product, and conversion to 24-bit RGB int.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class raytracer.math.AbstractVec3
